sen.e: Honden (the main shrine building), Wakamiya (the sub-shrine), Ise-jingu Shrine (two main shrines, Naiku and Geku), and the three shrines of Hachiman were built by carpenters from Harima Province under a bugyo Katsumoto KATAGIRI by order of Hideyori TOYOTOMI to excecute Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI's will.
